title: TVS Motor clocks 1 million exports in two wheeler segment in FY21-22
description: "The key exports include TVS Apache series, TVS HLX Series, TVS Raider and TVS Neo Series. An increase in sales in global motorcycles significantly contributed to this achievement", the company said in a statement.
